headline: Nike names insider new Converse CEO after Jared Carver steps down
summary: Nike said in an internal memo seen by Reuters on Thursday that Jared Carver, president and CEO of Converse, would step down and be succeeded by longtime company executive Aaron Cain. Nike is in the midst of realigning its business by sport across its Nike, Jordan and Converse brands. It has faced sluggish sales growth and mounting competition in the global athletic wear market, prompting cost-cutting measures and a strategic pivot toward performance-focused sports segments.
